meta.title: From THIS IS to FORTY
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: Welcome to **RUDDLE**! This week we're rebranding as the only Paul Rudd-themed daily word game. Today's game is inspired by Rudd's movie This is Forty, where he confronts his mid-life and considers the possibility of having a crisis. When it came out, I was only 36, so I found it totally unrelatable.

ladder.clue: Change one letter in <> to get something associated with academics
The last three letters of <> are an abbreviation for this relation
Replace the middle letter of <> with a double letter to get a time of day
Remove the first letter from <> to get a person's name
Change one letter in <> to get a flower
Anagram <> to get a word found on a map
Change the first and last letters of <> to get a number
